casebody.data:
Mason White HYDE
v.
Katie POOLE No. 88P15-5 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 12, 2016 Mason W. Hyde, for Hyde, Mason White. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 12th of December 2016 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Davie County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of December 2016."

Ervin, J. recused.
